description: sheet of paper that is white with purple gradated shading at bottom; image in center that is sectioned in vertical segments; left segment is a marbleized gilded surface with texture; second from left section has blue at top that gradates into a white shade in center, with green band of pigment at bottom; segment third from left is black with gold speckling; center segment is an gradated red shade with lighter dappled segments that yellow toward top; second from right section is green in pigment with faint black circular patterns and faint black lines; right segment is gold and textured
inscription: bottom center, in pencil: 手荷物 \'15-4 {Tenimotsu \'15-4} | on back, in bottom center, in pencil: \"Baggage 15-4\"
title: Baggage '15-4
